programme.title: Premiere Affaire
programme.desc: Nora, a young and an inexperienced criminal defense lawyer is charged with the case of a teenage boy accused of murdering a neighbour.

programme.title: Not Here To Be Loved
programme.desc: Jean-Claude is a disillusioned middle-age man who has long forgotten to smile. He is divorced, has a strained relationship with his only son and thinks his father never loved him. Then, he steps in to a tango school and meets Francoise and life changes.

programme.title: For A Moment, Forever
programme.desc: A young popstar overwhelmed by fame meets a troubled ex-rocker teaching music to adolescents at a therapy centre. Both longing for love, they get closer as affection for music connects them, but shall they overcome the burdens of his past?

programme.title: Adventures In The Land Of Asha
programme.desc: After 9-year-old Jules is banned from school because of his rare skin disease, his greatest wish is to be cured. He meets a mysterious new friend, Asha, after his dog runs away into the forest. Together, they go on an adventure to find a cure for him.

programme.title: The Kiss
programme.desc: In 1913 Denmark, young officer Anton grapples with duty and love when he befriends Baron von Løvenskjold's daughter, Edith, confined to a wheelchair. As their bond deepens, Anton is ensnared in a web of promises and lies, torn between pity and true love.

programme.title: Geranium
programme.desc: Just before her final exams, 19 years old Defne, must return to her hometown after her father's stroke. Although it is a perfect opportunity for her to heal their relationship, her trip back home inadvertently causes her to be sucked into family drama.

programme.title: Khutulun: The Wrestling Princess
programme.desc: Princess Khutulun, a formidable Mongol warrior descended from Genghis Khan, has her marriage ambushed by an assassin who steals the Golden Sutra. Vowing revenge, Khutulun and her clan set out on an epic journey to retrieve the sacred text and restore peace.

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: In small town Maine, a school bus driver becomes distracted during her end-of-day inspection and fails to notice a sleeping boy in the back of the bus. What happens next shatters the tranquillity of her small logging town.

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Twenty years after the Romanian Revolution, Tavi finds out from his secret police file that he might have a son he had not known about. In his search for the truth, Tavi gets caught up in his complicated past which threatens to mess up his current life.

programme.title: ONE Fight Night 30: Kryklia vs. Knowles
programme.desc: A colossal lineup of martial arts action awaits the global fan base when ONE Championship returns with ONE Fight Night 30: Kryklia vs. Knowles, which broadcasts live from Bangkok’s Lumpinee Stadium. The card is headlined by two massive World Title showdowns. In the main event, towering two-sport king Roman Kryklia defends the ONE Heavyweight Muay Thai World Title and seeks his fourth straight knockout victory. But his challenger, WBC Heavyweight Muay Thai World Champion Lyndon Knowles, has every intention of claiming the richest prize in the sport and ending Kryklia’s flawless run in ONE Championship. Plus, another two-sport king in Regian Eersel puts his ONE Lightweight Kickboxing World Championship on the line against former titleholder Alexis Nicolas in a thrilling trilogy battle. The rivals are deadlocked 1-1 in their heart-pounding series, putting even more than 26 pounds of gold at stake.

programme.title: Ragna Crimson - The Will Of Fight 克拉龍人拉格納 - EP16
programme.desc: The Argentum Corps successfully launched the first strike against Olto Zora, who sees his old master in Starlia.

programme.title: Geranium
programme.desc: Just before her final exams, 19 years old Defne, must return to her hometown after her father's stroke. Although it is a perfect opportunity for her to heal their relationship, her trip back home inadvertently causes her to be sucked into family drama.

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: In small town Maine, a school bus driver becomes distracted during her end-of-day inspection and fails to notice a sleeping boy in the back of the bus. What happens next shatters the tranquillity of her small logging town.

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: The Last Harvest
programme.desc: Traumatized policeman Ben delves into his own past to investigate a cold case obscured by a web of guilt, lies and deception. In the process, Marion, a doctor, helps him come to terms with himself and his past.

programme.title: All For Diego
programme.desc: Pablo and Diego are two brothers working as dishwashers at a bar while playing soccer in the afternoons. After Diego falls victim to a hit and run, Pablo enters into a soccer tournament in order to pay for the surgeries needed to keep his brother alive.

programme.title: Temporaries
programme.desc: Ariane gets a job as an interpreter at a food plant after moving back to the Richelieu Valley following a breakup. There, she finds herself torn between obeying the harsh demands of her boss and standing up for the exploited migrant workers she befriends.

programme.title: Cloud Under The Roof
programme.desc: Paul, Julia, and Lilly are a happy family, until Julia dies unexpectedly. For the sake of his daughter, Paul wants to function and suppress his grief. Lilly keeps challenging him with her imagination and her very own view of Mum's death.

programme.title: Murder in Kermadec
programme.desc: A man is found dead at the foot of a cliff in a small quiet fishing village. Captain Breguet who wanted to leave the region will have to stay a little longer to solve this crime. She will find a mysterious man on her way and fight to protect her daughter.

programme.title: Erased
programme.desc: Ana gives birth at a local hospital, but is shocked to find out that her file is no longer on the government network. Without legal status, she must struggle against government bureaucracy to keep her child and her identity.

programme.title: Natatorium
programme.desc: Lilja stays with her estranged grandparents while she auditions for a performance group. When her dad and aunt find out, a sense of panic arises. Dark secrets emerge from the household that threaten to destroy her future career and her life.

programme.title: Patchwork Family
programme.desc: Christian is a divorced father who can only see his young daughter Vanessa every other weekend. When he meets the single mother Christine and decides to participate in a summer TV show, his whole life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Lemonade
programme.desc: Mara, a young Romanian mother, is a caretaker in the US on a temporary visa. Life seemed perfect after she got married and brought her son over. However, she faces abuses of power from the officer in her green card process, who seeks to exploit her plight.

programme.title: King of Devil's Island
programme.desc: Norwegian winter, early 20th century. On the boys’ home Bastoy, a new inmate leads the boys to a violent uprising against a brutal regime. How far is he willing to go to attain freedom? Based on a true story.

programme.title: Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: A successful and dashing young man whose life of one-night stands seems to be going great until a teenybopper, claiming to be his daughter, knocks on his door.
